trans-unit.source: An abstract base class from which all classes that represent proposed changes to a running workflow instance must derive.
trans-unit.target: Uma classe base abstrata da qual todas as classes que representam as alterações propostas para uma instância de fluxo de trabalho em execução devem ser derivadas.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChangeAction" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementado em uma classe derivada, inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChangeAction" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> raiz do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, applies the changes to the root <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, aplica as alterações à <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> raiz.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the root <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> was updated with the added <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />, <see langword="false" /> if the root <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> raiz tiver sido atualizada com o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> adicionado, <see langword="false" /> se a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> raiz for uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> upon which to validate the changes.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> na qual as alterações serão validadas.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, validates the changes and returns a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection" /> that contains any errors.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, valida as alterações e retorna uma <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection" /> que contém erros.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="activityInstance" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="activityInstance" /> é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).
